content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map during these steps. The agent repeatedly attempted to supply a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) – a structure intended to receive Automation Science Packs for research – but none was crafted or placed because of API misusage and insufficient resources. Although the agent interacted with existing smelting facilities (an iron furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)) to process ores into plates, these were not built by the agent but merely used in resource processing. Overall, no additional structures appear on the map.

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Misuse
  – When calling get_entities, avoid unsupported keyword arguments (for example, do not pass ‘radius’) and do not supply extra positional arguments. Verify the correct function signature before use.
  
• Lab Placement and Retrieval
  – Confirm that a Lab exists in inventory before attempting its placement. Instead of directly iterating over a retrieved result (which may be None), check and default to an empty list if no entities are found.
  
• Crafting Dependency Shortages
  – Ensure that all prerequisite resources and sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are sufficiently available before initiating Lab crafting. Address resource chain dependencies (e.g. smelting raw materials in an appropriate furnace) to meet required ingredient amounts and avoid repeated crafting errors.
